I was born and raised in <a href="https://sscnapoli.it/en" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Napoli</a> where I grew up eating pizza, reading books and manga, playing guitar, and, most importantly, wondering about abstractness during my BSc, MSc, and PhD at the <a href="http://www.unina.it/en_GB/home" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Università degli Studi di Napoli Federico II</a> under the supervision of G. Marmo.

## Music
I like music and I used to play guitar.

I recorded the EP <a href="https://soundcloud.com/artrepaz" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><em>Via Soffritto</em></a>  neapolitan rock-blues band <a href="https://www.youtube.com/user/artrepaz" target="_blank" rel="noopener">ArtRePaz</a>. I was the lead guitar and we had a lot of fun before the bitterness of life chewed to death our rock 'n roll dreams.

I also have a <a href="https://ilcap1tan0.bandcamp.com/releases" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Bandcamp page</a> I seldomly update. There is no logic, nor beauty, nor any kind of sense in it, but I like it nonetheless.
